title: Reconstruction of human dispersal during Aurignacian on pan-European scale
abstract:
Anatomically modern humans dispersed through Europe during the Upper Palaeolithic. Here, the authors model this dispersal combining archaeological, paleoclimate, and palaeoecological data and investigating how these variables impacted human demographic processes. 
 The Aurignacian is the first techno-complex related with certainty to Anatomically Modern Humans in Europe. Studies show that they appeared around 43-42 kyr cal BP and dispersed rapidly in Europe during the Upper Palaeolithic. However, human dispersal is a highly convoluted process which is until today not well understood. Here, we provide a reconstruction of the human dispersal during the Aurignacian on the pan-European scale using a human dispersal model, the Our Way Model, which combines archaeological with paleoclimate data and uses the human existence potential as a unifying driver of human population dynamics. Based on the reconstruction, we identify the different stages of the human dispersal and analyse how human demographic processes are influenced by climate change and topography. A chronology of the Aurignacian human groups in Europe is provided, which is verified for locations where archaeological dating records are available. Insights into highly debated hypotheses, such as human dispersal routes, are provided. Anatomically modern humans dispersed through Europe during the Upper Palaeolithic. Here, the authors model this dispersal combining archaeological, paleoclimate, and palaeoecological data and investigating how these variables impacted human demographic processes.
authors: Yaping Shao;Christian Wegener;Konstantin Klein;Isabell Schmidt;Gerd-Christian Weniger
explanation: 该研究论文主要关注旧石器时代晚期欧洲人类的迁徙过程，结合考古、古气候和古生态数据，利用人类扩散模型重建了奥瑞纳文化时期人类在泛欧洲范围内的扩散过程。研究重点在于分析气候变化和地形对人类人口动态的影响，并探讨人类扩散路线等问题。该研究与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，没有涉及空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析等内容。

title: Fine-tuning protein language models boosts predictions across diverse tasks
abstract:
The use of protein language model embeddings has demonstrated state-of-the-art performance in many protein prediction tasks. Here, authors investigate parameter-efficient fine-tuning to further enhance performance and make this technique accessible through their easy-to-use notebooks. 
 Prediction methods inputting embeddings from protein language models have reached or even surpassed state-of-the-art performance on many protein prediction tasks. In natural language processing fine-tuning large language models has become the de facto standard. In contrast, most protein language model-based protein predictions do not back-propagate to the language model. Here, we compare the fine-tuning of three state-of-the-art models (ESM2, ProtT5, Ankh) on eight different tasks. Two results stand out. Firstly, task-specific supervised fine-tuning almost always improves downstream predictions. Secondly, parameter-efficient fine-tuning can reach similar improvements consuming substantially fewer resources at up to 4.5-fold acceleration of training over fine-tuning full models. Our results suggest to always try fine-tuning, in particular for problems with small datasets, such as for fitness landscape predictions of a single protein. For ease of adaptability, we provide easy-to-use notebooks to fine-tune all models used during this work for per-protein (pooling) and per-residue prediction tasks. The use of protein language model embeddings has demonstrated state-of-the-art performance in many protein prediction tasks. Here, authors investigate parameter-efficient fine-tuning to further enhance performance and make this technique accessible through their easy-to-use notebooks.
authors: Robert Schmirler;Michael Heinzinger;Burkhard Rost
explanation: 这篇论文主要研究的是蛋白质语言模型的微调，通过在不同蛋白质预测任务上对三种先进模型（ESM2，ProtT5，Ankh）进行微调，作者发现特定任务的监督微调几乎总是能提高下游预测结果。此外，参数高效的微调可以以高达 4.5 倍的训练速度，在消耗明显更少资源的情况下达到类似的改进。论文还提供了易于使用的笔记本，方便用户对所有模型进行微调，用于蛋白质预测任务。总而言之，这篇论文关注的是蛋白质语言模型在蛋白质预测任务中的应用，与大气环境遥感技术关系不大。

topic_words: ['remote sensing', 'drought', 'spatial patterns', 'temporal patterns', 'fused datasets', 'satellite observations', 'vegetation indices', 'land surface temperature', 'urbanization']
title: Urbanization-induced spatial and temporal patterns of local drought revealed by high-resolution fused remotely sensed datasets
authors: Shuzhe Huang;Siqi Wang;Jing Chen;Chao Wang;Xiang Zhang;Jiefeng Wu;Chunlong Li;Aminjon Gulakhmadov;Dev Niyogi;Nengcheng Chen
explanation: 该研究利用高分辨率融合遥感数据，分析了城市化对局部干旱时空格局的影响。研究中使用了多种遥感数据，包括植被指数、地表温度等，这些数据可以反映出干旱的程度和范围。通过分析这些数据，研究者可以了解城市化如何改变干旱的发生频率、持续时间和强度。

title: Global mapping of human-transformed dike-pond systems
authors: Yang Xu;Lian Feng;Hongwei Fang;Xiao-Peng Song;Fabian Gieseke;Ankit Kariryaa;Stefan Oehmcke;Luke Gibson;Xiating Jiang;Ruimin Lin;R. Iestyn Woolway;Chunmiao Zheng;Martin Brandt;Rasmus Fensholt
explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要表明它关注的是人类改造的堤塘系统，这是一种水利工程和生态系统，与大气环境遥感技术关系不大。研究可能涉及地理空间分析、土地利用变化、水文模型等，但与空气质量监测、卫星观测或大气成分分析无关。

title: A machine learning downscaling framework based on a physically constrained sliding window technique for improving resolution of global water storage anomaly
authors: Gangqiang Zhang;Tongren Xu;Wenjie Yin;Sayed M. Bateni;Changhyun Jun;Dongkyun Kim;Shaomin Liu;Ziwei Xu;Wenting Ming;Jiancheng Wang
explanation: 该论文提出了一种基于物理约束滑动窗口技术的机器学习降尺度框架，用于提高全球水储量异常的解析度。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为水储量异常是地球气候系统的重要指标，可以通过卫星观测来监测。该论文利用机器学习技术将粗分辨率的卫星数据降尺度到更精细的尺度，从而提高对水储量异常的理解和预测能力。

title: An efficient and generalisable approach for mapping paddy rice fields based on their unique spectra during the transplanting period leveraging the CIE colour space
authors: Huapeng Li;Jujian Huang;Ce Zhang;Xiangyu Ning;Shuqing Zhang;Peter M. Atkinson
explanation: 这篇论文主要关注利用水稻移植期的独特光谱特征，基于CIE颜色空间，来识别和绘制水稻田。它与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，主要涉及农业遥感和图像处理领域。

title: Mapping aboveground biomass in Indonesian lowland forests using GEDI and hierarchical models
authors: Paul B. May;Michael Schlund;John Armston;Martyna M. Kotowska;Fabian Brambach;Arne Wenzel;Stefan Erasmi
explanation: 这篇论文主要研究的是利用GEDI卫星数据和分层模型来估算印度尼西亚低地森林地上生物量，属于遥感技术在森林生态学方面的应用，与大气环境遥感技术关系不大。

title: A novel AMSR2 retrieval algorithm for global C-band vegetation optical depth and soil moisture (AMSR2 IB): Parameters' calibration, evaluation and inter-comparison
authors: Mengjia Wang;Philippe Ciais;Frédéric Frappart;Shengli Tao;Lei Fan;Rui Sun;Xiaojun Li;Xiangzhuo Liu;Huan Wang;Jean-Pierre Wigneron
explanation: 这篇论文研究了一种新的算法，利用 AMSR2 卫星数据来反演全球 C 波段植被光学厚度和土壤水分。AMSR2 是一种微波辐射计，可以测量地表发射的微波辐射，这些信息可以用来推断土壤水分和植被状况。这项研究对该算法的参数进行了校准和评估，并与其他方法进行了比较。

title: Bridging spatio-temporal discontinuities in global soil moisture mapping by coupling physics in deep learning
authors: Zushuai Wei;Linguang Miao;Jian Peng;Tianjie Zhao;Lingkui Meng;Hui Lu;Zhiqing Peng;Michael H. Cosh;Bin Fang;Venkat Lakshmi;Jiancheng Shi
explanation: 该论文研究了利用深度学习技术结合物理模型来解决全球土壤水分遥感数据时空不连续性问题。土壤水分是陆地生态系统的重要组成部分，对气候变化和水循环有着重要影响。利用卫星遥感技术可以获取大范围的土壤水分数据，但由于卫星观测的时间和空间分辨率限制，以及不同传感器之间数据的不一致性，会导致数据时空不连续性。该论文通过将物理模型与深度学习方法相结合，建立了土壤水分时空连续性模型，提高了土壤水分遥感数据的精度和可靠性。

title: Extended aerosol and surface characterization from S5P/TROPOMI with GRASP algorithm. Part I: Conditions, approaches, performance and new possibilities
abstract:
•Extended aerosol/surface characterization can be derived from single angle measurements. •The conditions for the extended characterization are analyzed •The quality of TROPOMI/GRASP extended product is discussed. •The new possibilities of the TROPOMI/GRASP extended retrieval are demonstrated. 
 Atmospheric aerosols have strong impact on climate, environment, and health. To account correctly for such impact, extended aerosol characterization, including spectral Aerosol Optical Depth (AOD), Angstrom Exponent (AE), spectral Single Scattering Albedo (SSA) etc., are required to be derived globally from space-borne observations. Together with the aerosol, the Earth's surfaces are an important component of climate system, reflecting and absorbing solar and atmospheric radiation and being sources of emission of different natural aerosol, for example, sea-salt, mineral dust or organic aerosol.Since the beginning of space-borne atmospheric observation it was recognized that the most comprehensive extended aerosol and surface characterization can be achieved from multi-angular polarimetric measurements. In this paper, we show that the extended aerosol characterization can be obtained even from single viewing radiance only satellite measurements when several crucial conditions are fulfilled both for the observations and retrieval algorithm: (i) wide spectral range (for example, covering UV, VIR, NIR and SWIR spectra) providing rich spectral information about aerosol and surface; (ii) wide swath of measurements ensuring frequent overpassing over the same ground pixel to account for the different temporal variability of aerosol and surface properties as well as for angular dependence of surface reflectance; (iii) applied algorithm should be able to treat multi-temporal and multi-spatial observation accounting for spatial and temporal dependencies of aerosol and surface characteristics.The new possibilities of retrieval of aerosol and surface properties are investigated by applying the advanced GRASP (Generalized Retrieval of Atmosphere and Surface Properties) algorithm to the space-borne S5P/TROPOMI observations. The most optimal for these purposes forward and inversion approaches are discussed, and the quality of retrieved aerosol and surface properties is evaluated. The possibilities of TROPOMI/GRASP approach for aerosol extended characterization are demonstrated on several aerosol events including dust storms, biomass burning and anthropogenic aerosol pollution outbreaks in worldwide locations.
authors: Pavel Litvinov;Cheng Chen;Oleg Dubovik;Lukas Bindreiter;Christian Matar;David Fuertes;Anton Lopatin;Tatyana Lapyonok;Verena Lanzinger;Andreas Hangler;Michael Aspetsberger;Martin de Graaf;Lieuwe Gijsbert Tilstra;Piet Stammes;Alexandru Dandocsi;Daniele Gasbarra;Elody Fluck;Claus Zehner;Christian Retscher
explanation: 这篇论文研究了利用卫星观测数据进行大气环境遥感，特别是利用Sentinel-5P卫星搭载的TROPOMI传感器获取数据，并结合GRASP算法进行扩展的“气溶胶和地表特征”反演。论文重点关注了从单角度观测数据中提取扩展气溶胶和地表特征的可能性，并分析了实现这一目标所需的条件和算法。论文还展示了该方法在不同气溶胶事件（如沙尘暴、生物质燃烧、人为污染等）中的应用，并评估了反演结果的质量。

topic_words: ['CO2 emissions', 'power plants', 'Aerosols', 'Lidar', 'DQ-1', 'atmospheric composition', 'satellite observations', 'air quality monitoring']
title: Quantifying CO<sub>2</sub> emissions of power plants with Aerosols and Carbon Dioxide Lidar onboard DQ-1
authors: Ge Han;Yiyang Huang;Tianqi Shi;Hongyuan Zhang;Siwei Li;Haowei Zhang;Weibiao Chen;Jiqiao Liu;Wei Gong
explanation: 该研究使用搭载在DQ-1卫星上的气溶胶和二氧化碳激光雷达来量化发电厂的二氧化碳排放。这是一种利用卫星遥感技术监测大气成分和空气质量的应用，旨在通过对二氧化碳排放的精确测量来评估发电厂的碳排放量。

topic_words: ['vegetation optical depth', 'soil moisture', 'P-band radiometry', 'dense crop canopies']
title: P-band radiometry for enhanced vegetation optical depth (VOD) and soil moisture retrieval in dense crop canopies
authors: Xiaoji Shen;Lei Fan;Tengteng Zuo;Tianyu Cui;Jiayi Wu;Nan Ye;Foad Brakhasi;Xiaoling Wu;Liujun Zhu;Jean-Pierre Wigneron;Jeffrey P. Walker;Ke Zhang
explanation: 该研究主要关注利用P波段辐射计来增强密集作物冠层中植被光学厚度（VOD）和土壤水分的提取。它与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，主要集中于农业遥感领域，利用微波遥感技术来监测作物生长状况和土壤水分变化。

topic_words: ['land surface temperature', 'remote sensing', 'satellite observations', 'atmospheric composition', 'air quality']
title: An integrated method for angular and temporal reconstruction of land surface temperatures
authors: Zunjian Bian;Shouyi Zhong;J.-L. Roujean;Xiangyang Liu;Sibo Duan;Hua Li;Biao Cao;Ruibo Li;Yongming Du;Qing Xiao;Qinhuo Liu
explanation: 这篇论文研究了一种整合方法，用于重建地表温度的时空分布。地表温度是重要的环境参数，与大气环境密切相关。例如，地表温度的变化会影响大气边界层的稳定性，进而影响空气质量。因此，这项研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用卫星观测数据来重建地表温度，并为大气环境监测和分析提供重要信息。

title: Patterns and Trends in Northern Hemisphere River Ice Phenology from 2000 to 2021
authors: Xinchi Wang;Lian Feng
explanation: 该研究主要关注北半球河流冰冻现象的时空变化趋势，并利用2000年至2021年的卫星遥感数据进行分析。研究内容涉及利用卫星数据监测河流冰情，分析冰冻期和融化期的变化趋势，以及气候变化对河流冰冻现象的影响。

title: Characterizing the kinematics of active rock glaciers in Daxue Shan, southeastern Tibetan plateau, using SAR interferometry and generalized boosted modeling
authors: Jiaxin Cai;Xiaowen Wang;Tingting Wu;Renzhe Wu;Guoxiang Liu
explanation: 这篇论文主要研究了位于青藏高原东南部的岷山山脉的活动岩冰川的运动学特征，利用了合成孔径雷达干涉测量技术 (SAR interferometry)。它关注的是地表变化和地质过程，而非大气环境遥感技术。

title: CascadeDumpNet: Enhancing open dumpsite detection through deep learning and AutoML integrated dual-stage approach using high-resolution satellite imagery
authors: Siwei Zhang;Jun Ma
explanation: 该论文主要关注利用高分辨率卫星图像，结合深度学习和自动机器学习技术，来识别开放式垃圾堆放场。它与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，更偏向于土地利用变化监测和环境污染源识别领域。

topic_words: ['downward shortwave radiation', 'rugged terrain', 'clouds', 'atmospheric composition', 'satellite observations', 'remote sensing']
title: Downward shortwave radiation modeling over rugged terrain with clouds
authors: Guangjian Yan;Chunqiang Zhao;Qing Chu;Xihan Mu;Yingji Zhou;Yanan Liu;Xuejun Wang;Donghui Xie
explanation: 这篇论文研究了在云层覆盖下，崎岖地形上的向下短波辐射建模。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它涉及到利用卫星观测来分析大气成分，特别是辐射传输和云层对辐射的影响。该研究有助于提高大气模型的精度，从而改善空气质量监测和气候变化研究。

topic_words: ['satellite-derived SST', 'cloud', 'machine learning', 'remote sensing', 'atmospheric composition', 'sea surface temperature']
title: Accurate reconstruction of satellite-derived SST under cloud and cloud-free areas using a physically-informed machine learning approach
authors: Chih-Chieh Young;Yu-Chien Cheng;Ming-An Lee;Jun-Hong Wu
explanation: 该论文研究了利用机器学习方法从卫星数据中重建海面温度（SST），即使在云层覆盖区域也能准确重建。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用卫星观测来分析大气成分（海面温度）并进行相关研究。

title: Improved global estimation of seasonal variations in C3 photosynthetic capacity based on eco-evolutionary optimality hypotheses and remote sensing
authors: Yihong Liu;Jing M. Chen;Mingzhu Xu;Rong Wang;Weiliang Fan;Wenyu Li;Lucas Kammer;Colin Prentice;Trevor F. Keenan;Nicholas G. Smith
explanation: 该研究利用生态进化最优性假设和遥感技术，对全球C3植物光合能力的季节性变化进行改进估计。研究重点在于利用遥感数据来监测植物光合能力的变化，并分析其与环境因素之间的关系，这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。

title: A mixing scheme of ice particle models for global ice cloud measurements
authors: Banghai Wu;Yu Wang;Xiaoye Fan;Shi Liu;Yixiao Fu
explanation: 这篇论文研究了全球冰云测量中冰粒子模型的混合方案。冰云是地球大气中重要的组成部分，对气候变化和辐射平衡具有重要影响。论文中提到的混合方案可能是利用不同类型的卫星传感器或观测数据来更准确地测量冰云的特性，例如冰粒子的形状、大小和浓度。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为卫星观测是获取全球范围内的冰云信息的重要手段，而冰云的特性分析对于理解大气成分和气候变化至关重要。

title: Exploring vegetation chlorophyll fluorescence with leaf dorsiventrality
authors: Hanyu Shi
explanation: 该研究的标题和摘要表明它与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。研究重点在于利用叶片背腹面差异来探索植被叶绿素荧光，这与卫星观测和大气成分分析息息相关。叶绿素荧光可以作为植物生理状态的指示器，而卫星观测可以提供大范围的植被覆盖信息。通过分析叶绿素荧光数据，研究人员可以了解植被的健康状况、光合作用效率以及碳循环等信息，这些信息对于大气环境监测和气候变化研究至关重要。

title: High-resolution mapping of forest structure and carbon stock using multi-source remote sensing data in Japan
authors: Hantao Li;Takuya Hiroshima;Xiaoxuan Li;Masato Hayashi;Tomomichi Kato
explanation: 该研究使用多源遥感数据对日本森林结构和碳储量进行高分辨率测绘。研究重点在于利用遥感技术分析森林结构和碳储量，与大气环境遥感技术关系不大。

title: Urban land surface temperature retrieval with high-spatial resolution SDGSAT-1 thermal infrared data
authors: Xiaoying Ouyang;Zhongchang Sun;Shugui Zhou;Youjun Dou
explanation: 该研究主要关注城市地表温度的遥感反演，利用的是SDGSAT-1卫星的热红外数据。它与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，主要侧重于城市热环境研究。

title: Time-series China urban land use mapping (2016–2022): An approach for achieving spatial-consistency and semantic-transition rationality in temporal domain
authors: Shuping Xiong;Xiuyuan Zhang;Yichen Lei;Ge Tan;Haoyu Wang;Shihong Du
explanation: 该论文主要关注中国城市土地利用变化的时空分析，利用时间序列数据进行土地利用制图，并强调了空间一致性和语义转换的合理性。研究内容与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，主要集中在遥感影像处理、地理信息系统和土地利用变化分析领域。

topic_words: ['atmospheric composition', 'carbon dioxide', 'satellite observations', 'OCO-2', 'terrestrial carbon cycle', 'remote sensing']
title: The Orbiting Carbon Observatory-2 (OCO-2) and in situ CO<sub>2</sub> data suggest a larger seasonal amplitude of the terrestrial carbon cycle compared to many dynamic global vegetation models
authors: Ruixue Lei;Jeralyn Poe;Deborah Huntzinger;Junjie Liu;Stephen Stich;David F. Baker;Leyang Feng;Dylan C. Gaeta;Ziting Huang;Scot M. Miller
explanation: 这篇论文研究了利用轨道碳观测卫星-2 (OCO-2) 和地面二氧化碳数据来分析陆地碳循环的季节性变化幅度。OCO-2 是一种专门用于测量大气中二氧化碳浓度的卫星，它可以提供全球范围的二氧化碳数据。研究者将 OCO-2 的数据与地面观测数据进行比较，发现陆地碳循环的季节性变化幅度比许多动态全球植被模型预测的更大。这表明，现有的模型可能需要改进，以更好地模拟陆地碳循环对大气二氧化碳浓度的影响。

title: A global urban heat island intensity dataset: Generation, comparison, and analysis
authors: Qiquan Yang;Yi Xu;TC Chakraborty;Meng Du;Ting Hu;Ling Zhang;Yue Liu;Rui Yao;Jie Yang;Shurui Chen;Changjiang Xiao;Renrui Liu;Mingjie Zhang;Rui Chen
explanation: 这篇论文研究了全球城市热岛强度数据集的生成、比较和分析。城市热岛效应是指城市地区比周围郊区或农村地区温度更高的现象，这与城市化过程中的热量积累有关。论文可能利用了卫星遥感技术来获取城市地区的表面温度数据，并以此来分析城市热岛强度。

title: First lunar-light mapping of nighttime dust season oceanic aerosol optical depth over North Atlantic from space
authors: Meng Zhou;Jun Wang;Xi Chen;Yi Wang;Peter R. Colarco;Robert C. Levy;Steven D. Miller
explanation: 该研究利用卫星观测数据，结合月球光照，首次对北大西洋夜间沙尘季海面气溶胶光学厚度进行了绘制。这是一种利用卫星遥感技术监测大气环境，特别是沙尘气溶胶对空气质量影响的创新方法。

title: An integrated framework for estimating the hourly all-time cloudy-sky surface long-wave downward radiation for Fengyun-4A/AGRI
authors: Qi Zeng;Jie Cheng;Hao Sun;Shengyue Dong
explanation: 该研究论文主要关注利用风云四号A星（FY-4A）搭载的农业星载多光谱成像仪（AGRI）数据来估算全天候云层覆盖下的地表长波向下辐射。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为地表长波向下辐射是评估地球能量平衡和气候变化的重要参数，而云层对辐射的影响是研究中的关键因素。论文中提到的“全天候”和“云层覆盖”表明研究者试图克服云层遮挡的影响，从而更准确地获取地表辐射信息，这对于大气环境监测和气候研究具有重要意义。

title: Enhancing wheat crop physiology monitoring through spectroscopic analysis of stomatal conductance dynamics
authors: K.H. Cheng;Zhuangzhuang Sun;Wanlu Zhong;Zhihui Wang;Marco Visser;Shuwen Liu;Zhengbing Yan;Yingyi Zhao;Ruinan Zhang;Jingrong Zang;Shichao Jin;Jin Wu
explanation: 该研究主要关注利用光谱分析技术监测小麦作物气孔导度动态，以增强对小麦生理状况的监测。研究重点在于植物生理学和农业领域，而非大气环境遥感。光谱分析技术可以用于监测植物叶片的光合作用和水分状况，但与大气环境遥感技术关系不大。

title: The high spatial resolution Drought Response Index (HiDRI): An integrated framework for monitoring vegetation drought with remote sensing, deep learning, and spatiotemporal fusion
authors: Zhenheng Xu;Hao Sun;Tian Zhang;Huanyu Xu;Dan Wu;JinHua Gao
explanation: 这篇论文介绍了一种名为 HiDRI 的高空间分辨率干旱响应指数，该指数利用遥感、深度学习和时空融合技术来监测植被干旱。HiDRI 结合了卫星观测数据和机器学习模型，能够提供高精度、高分辨率的植被干旱信息，这对于评估干旱影响、制定干旱应对策略具有重要意义。

title: River ice breakup classification using dual- (HH&HV) or compact-polarization RADARSAT Constellation Mission data
authors: Torsten Geldsetzer;Nicolas Svacina;Simon Tolszczuk-Leclerc;Joost van der Sanden
explanation: 该研究利用RADARSAT星座任务的双极化（HH&HV）或紧凑极化数据对河流冰裂进行分类。它侧重于利用卫星遥感技术监测河流冰情，与大气环境遥感技术关系不大。

topic_words: ['fire', 'atmospheric state', 'hyperspectral infrared sounding', 'narrow-band imagery', 'satellite observations', 'air quality']
title: Characterizing fire and fire atmospheric states from space using collocated hyperspectral infrared sounding and narrow-band imagery
authors: Xuyang Zhou;Qing Yue;King-Fai Li;Evan Fishbein;Xiuhong Chen;Lin Tan;Sally Newman;Eric Fetzer;Yuk L. Yung
explanation: 该研究利用同步的超光谱红外探测和窄带成像技术，从太空对火灾及其大气状态进行表征。研究重点在于利用卫星观测数据分析火灾对大气环境的影响，包括大气成分的变化和空气质量的监测。

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
title: Corrigendum to “Biomass estimation of abandoned orange trees using UAV-SFM 3D points” [Int. J. Appl. Earth Obs. Geoinf. 130 (2024) 103931]
authors: J. Estornell;J. Martí;E. Hadas;I. López-Cortés;B. Velázquez-Martí;A. Fernández-Sarría
explanation: 该论文主要关注使用无人机结构化光三维重建技术来估计废弃橙树的生物量，属于遥感技术在农业领域的应用，与大气环境遥感技术关系不大。

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
title: A hybrid model coupling PROSAIL and continuous wavelet transform based on multi-angle hyperspectral data improves maize chlorophyll retrieval
abstract:
•Wavelet features can precisely capture signals caused by chlorophyll changes. •HMWF performs better in chlorophyll retrieval than HMOS and HMVI. •HMWF have greater accuracy at off-nadir angles compared to nadir angle (0°). •HMWF3 achieved the highest accuracy at −10° for retrieving LCC and CCC. 
 Chlorophyll is both a cornerstone of plant photosynthesis and an important indicator for assessing crop growth and health. Although many previous studies have explored the use of remote sensing to retrieve chlorophyll content, there is room for improvement in the proposed retrieval models, especially the hybrid model, and its performance in combination with multi-angle remote sensing remains unknown. To this end, we developed a hybrid chlorophyll retrieval model by coupling PROSAIL, Gaussian process regression, and continuous wavelet transform (CWT) based on multi-angle (−60° to 60°) hyperspectral observations of maize. The CWT converts PROSAIL-modeled and measured spectral reflectance into wavelet features (WF) that finely capture signals due to chlorophyll changes, making WF-based hybrid models (HMWF) promising for enhanced chlorophyll retrieval. Our results show that for leaf chlorophyll content (LCC) and canopy chlorophyll content (CCC) retrieval, combining low and medium scale WFs (scales3-5) with hybrid models is more advantageous than using other scale WFs. The accuracy of the HMWF based on the best-scale WF was significantly higher than that of the hybrid model based on original spectrum or vegetation indices. Additionally, our evaluation of the effect of viewing zenith angles (VZAs) on HMWF showed that the accuracies of HMWF acquired at non-nadir angles were generally higher than those acquired at nadir angle. Among all models, the HMWF based on the scale3 WF had the highest accuracy at −10°, with R2 = 0.85 and RMSE=3.55 for LCC retrievals, and R2 = 0.78 and RMSE=0.22 for CCC retrievals. Furthermore, the HMWF showed the least sensitivity to changes in VZAs, especially in the range of −10° to −40°. Overall, these findings highlight the effectiveness of HMWF with multi-angle hyperspectral data in improving chlorophyll retrieval accuracy. This study serves as a reference for crop parameter retrieval, crucial for advancing agricultural monitoring and management.
authors: Anting Guo;Wenjiang Huang;Binxiang Qian;Huichun Ye;Quanjun Jiao;Xiangzhe Cheng;Chao Ruan
explanation: 这篇论文主要研究的是利用多角度高光谱数据结合 PROSAIL 模型和连续小波变换来提高玉米叶片和冠层叶绿素含量的反演精度。它关注的是利用遥感技术来监测作物生长状况，而非大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析。

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
title: A rational delineation method for active land blocks on the southeastern margin of the Tibetan Plateau based on high-precision GNSS horizontal velocity fields
authors: Lingxiao Zhang;Wei Qu;Rong Huang;Zhen Ye;Xiaohua Tong
explanation: 该研究主要关注青藏高原东南缘的陆块活动，利用高精度GNSS水平速度场进行划分。它与大气环境遥感技术关系不大，主要涉及地质学和地球物理学领域。
